Detailed Description

Function Documentation

pmErrCode_t PMHALMsgmgrInit ( void  )

Function to initialize the MSGMGR interface.

Parameters
None.
Returns
status PM_SUCCESS If init completes successfully PM_FAIL If init fails
pmErrCode_t PMHALMsgmgrPoll ( uint32_t  proxy,
uint32_t  queue,
uint32_t  timeout 
)

Function to poll a Message Manager proxy for a pending message.

Parameters
proxyProxy to poll for message
queueQueue within proxy to poll for message
timeoutPolling timeout
Returns
status PM_SUCCESS If message detected in proxy queue PM_FAIL If polling timed out
pmErrCode_t PMHALMsgmgrRead ( uint32_t  proxy,
uint32_t  queue,
uint32_t *  data,
uint32_t  size 
)

Function to read message from Message Manager proxy.

Parameters
proxyProxy to read
queueQueue within proxy to read
dataPointer to data array where read data will be stored
sizeSize of data array in bytes
Returns
status PM_SUCCESS If read completes successfuly PM_MSGMGR_INVALID_MSG_FORMAT If read fails

queueQueue within proxy to write
dataPointer to data
sizeSize of data in bytes
